scripts.build: rimraf dist && vite-run build && vite-run types
scripts.release: npm run -s build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:module
scripts.clean:module: pnpm recursive exec -- rimraf node_modules && rimraf node_modules
scripts.clean:dist: pnpm recursive exec -- rimraf dist && rimraf dist
